column2: "I guess all of this must seem normal to everyone else, but to me, it's all new and exciting."
"Like the monitors in the lobby. When I first saw them, I thought something was moving inside the wall!"
"Losing my memory has made things difficult for me, but I've been enjoying my first encounters with all these things other people take for granted."
"O-of course, I am doing my best to remember. I haven't lost sight of that."
"I was just thinking, maybe losing your memory doesn't have to be all bad. Mhm."
